summary: Documentary that covers the famous and successful expedition of the Everest conquest by Tenzing Norgay and Edmund Hillary, the first climbers to reach its peak.
cast: Meredith Edwards|John Hunt|George Band|Tom Bourdillon|Charles Evans|Alfred Gregory|Edmund Hillary|George Lowe|Wilfred Noyce|Griffith Pugh|Thomas Stobart|Tenzing Norgay|Michael Ward|Michael Westmacott|Charles Wylie|Jan Morris|Queen Elizabeth II|Eric Shipton
title: The Conquest of Everest
